title: Wanted:  1 T207 to finish set: Donnelly, Boston Nat'l
author: frohme

posts.post_title: Wanted:  1 T207 to finish set: Donnelly, Boston Nat'l
posts.post_content:
Looking for one last T207 - Donnelly, Boston Nat'l.  

Willing to buy/trade/work-for-card, though singing (like five) is "right out". ;)

At this point, any grade/condition is AOK in order to reach some bit of completion.  Contemplating upgrades is ... well ... too much to think about.  

Link to images from the set is in my signature - many of you will recognize your cards scattered throughout.  Your collective help has been great throughout this 3+ year learning experience.    Any help in closing this last hole would be very much appreciated.

Thanks.
--
Mike
